p: Vitamin C, known as ascorbic acid, is an essential vitamin principally abundant in the Citrus spp. and commonly sold as a dietary supplement ( Figure 2) [ 35]. Nowadays, it is under investigation for its biological effects for COVID-19 patients [ 36]. It has well-established antioxidant properties by scavenging oxygen free radicals and represents a key cofactor for the production of several neurotransmitters and hormones.
